whole_object: She's found the ideal spot to 'pool' her thoughts together!
single_object:
- Lounge chairs: These lounge chairs are so laid-back, they refuse to take part in any form of upright activity.
- Hot tub: This hot tub's social bubble is very exclusive - only the most chilled-out can join.
- Palm tree: The palm tree always knew how to keep its fronds close and its enemies closer.
- Deck: The deck is truly outstanding in its field—well, if only it weren't so flat and wooden.
- Drink: This tropical drink has so much zest for life, it's always the main squeeze at parties.
multi_object:
- Lounge chairs  
- Hot tub  
- "These lounge chairs are so comfortable, I might just take a dip in the hot tub to celebrate their greatness!"  

- Hot tub  
- Drink  
- "This hot tub is like a party for my muscles, and my drink is the DJ spinning the tunes!"  

- Palm tree  
- Deck  
- "The palm tree is so chill, it’s practically the bouncer of the deck, keeping all the stress out!"  

- Deck  
- Lounge chairs  
- "The deck is the ultimate hangout spot, where lounge chairs gather to gossip about the hot tub's latest bubbles!"  

- Drink  
- Palm tree  
- "My drink is so refreshing, even the palm tree is swaying in approval, trying to catch a sip!"
